title: Spyro The Dragon (PSP)
description:
Spyro The Dragon PSOne game converted properly to PSP.

=======================================================================

Copy the Spyro The Dragon folder with the EBOOT.PBP to PSPGAME

=======================================================================

Loading may take some time. When in the game press the 'HOME' button,
go to 'other settings' and change 'disc-load speed' to 'fast'

=======================================================================


Enjoy and please SEED!!!
